scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && concurrent -r "npm run less" "npm run build:ts" && npm run cordova
scripts.build:ts: tsconfig && npm run ts && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdirp app/dist && browserify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v
scripts.copy: mkdirp cordova/www && concurrent -r "npm run copy:dist" "npm run copy:fonts" "npm run copy:images" "npm run copy:index"
scripts.copy:fonts: npm run copy:fonts:local && ncp app/fonts cordova/www/fonts
scripts.cordova: npm run copy && plat cordova prepare && plat cordova build
scripts.prepublish: npm run tsd && tsconfig && npm run initialize && npm run build:ts
scripts.watch: concurrent -r -k "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:less" "npm run watch:bundle"
scripts.watch:less: nodemon -q -w app -e less --exec npm run less
